translation.en: -You lose. You lose! -You cheated!
By the way, it's not a dinner. It's your surprise birthday party.
translation.it: Non è una cena. È la tua festa di compleanno a sorpresa.

translation.en: -I hate you. -Just don't ruin it for them.
[all yell] Surprise!
[in Arabic] Why aren't you surprised?
Seems like you knew, little one.
No, of course not. How could I know?
translation.it: No, e come facevo a saperlo?

translation.en: Happy birthday, darling.
Thanks, Mama.
Now go to your room and change your clothes.
translation.it: Ora vai in camera e cambiati.

translation.en: OK, everyone, let's eat. Help yourselves.
[reporter in English] The Syrian revolution is starting.
People all on the streets,
demanding the removal of President Bashar al-Assad in Damascus.
translation.it: e chiede la destituzione del Presidente Bashar al-Assad a Damasco.

translation.en: We are together, Sunnis and Alawites…
[in Arabic] Sara, what are you doing? Come dance with us.
translation.it: Sara, perché non vieni a ballare con noi?

translation.en: -In a minute. -What are you watching?
[in English] A group of Syrian women are shouting…
translation.it: Un gruppo di donne sta urlando...

translation.en: [in Arabic] I told you not to watch these things.
This is reality, Mama.
What happened in Tunisia, Egypt, and Libya is happening here.
translation.it: La stessa di Libia, Tunisia ed Egitto.

translation.en: [mother] And I've told you nothing like that can happen in Syria.
translation.it: Ti ho detto che in Siria non succederà.

translation.en: [in English] The anger is building--
[mother in Arabic] Yalla, darling.
[Sara] The party's boring. I don't want to. [mother] Come on, for your sister's sake.
translation.it: - È una festa noiosa. - Fallo per tua sorella.

translation.en: Uncle, come on.
[in English] Everyone say "cheese."
[all] Cheese!
[man in Arabic] I thank God day and night for blessing me with three daughters,
translation.it: Ringrazio Allah tutti i giorni per avermi dato tre figlie forti,

translation.en: stronger than a thousand sons.
translation.it: più forti di mille figli maschi.

translation.en: But don't forget how lucky these girls are that I'm their dad
translation.it: Ma non dimentichiamo che anche loro sono fortunate ad avermi come padre

translation.en: and their coach.
Here he goes.
Two weeks ago, at the qualifying meet for the National Championships,
translation.it: Due settimane fa, alle qualificazioni per i Campionati nazionali,

translation.en: Yusra improved her personal best in the 100m butterfly.
translation.it: Yusra ha migliorato il suo record nei 100 metri farfalla.

translation.en: [man 2] Congrats, Yusra.
But Sara won her heat too.
translation.it: Sara ha vinto nella sua batteria.

translation.en: [man] Yeah, Sara is headstrong and a leader like me.
translation.it: Sara è determinata ed è una leader, come suo padre.

translation.en: But Yusra has discipline, strength, and perseverance.
translation.it: Ma Yusra ha disciplina, forza e perseveranza.

translation.en: She is my powerhouse.
What about me? And you, Shahed, Daddy's darling,
translation.it: - E io? - Tu sei l'amore mio, Shahed,

translation.en: are my little warrior.
translation.it: e sei anche la mia piccola guerriera.

translation.en: Dear guests, I will be the first father in history
translation.it: Cari ospiti, sarò il primo padre della storia

translation.en: to have three daughters swimming in the Olympics.
translation.it: ad avere tre figlie che partecipano alle Olimpiadi.

translation.en: ♪ Oh, oh, oh, oh, well Can you feel it… ♪
-[girl in English] Isn't that your cousin? -Nizar.
-[in Arabic] How you doing? -Good. Play a song for us.
translation.it: - Come stai? - Bene. Metti una canzone per noi.

translation.en: -What? -Play a song for us.
translation.it: - Eh? - Una canzone per noi, dai!

translation.en: -What's it worth? -I'll buy you a shot.
translation.it: - Quanto mi dai. - Ti pago uno shottino.

translation.en: For you guys.
[woman 2] Go, Sara, go! Kick his ass!
Show me, then.
No, you can't do that.
No, I swear you can't do that.
translation.it: No, non puoi farlo. È sleale.

translation.en: [in English] It's late. We should go home.
[in Arabic] Why?
[in English] We have to be at the pool at six.
Do you seriously think there's any point in training anymore?
translation.it: Credi serva a qualcosa continuare ad allenarsi?

translation.en: -If I want to make the Olympics. -[Sara] The Olympics?
translation.it: - Sì, se voglio andare alle Olimpiadi. - Le Olimpiadi?

translation.en: Swimming for who?
There's no country left anymore.
translation.it: Non è rimasto niente di questo Paese.

translation.en: Syria's gone! Bah. Haven't you noticed?
translation.it: La Siria non esiste più. Non te sei accorta?

translation.en: It is still early.
[Nizar in Arabic] What?
-What? -Razan Haddad is dead.
translation.it: - Che c'è? - Razan Haddad è morta.

translation.en: [Sara] In a bombing.
[in English] It's all over Facebook.
[in Arabic] My God…
I just saw her.
[in English] You see? All the more reason to go home.
translation.it: Visto? Una ragione in più per tornarcene a casa.

translation.en: All the more reason to party.
translation.it: Una ragione in più per fare festa.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Sara, be careful. Get back in.
You're so annoying. Hala, you can help me, you know.
translation.it: Sei irritante, veramente. Hala, mi aiuti o no?

translation.en: [shouts] Razan Haddad! We'll never forget you!
translation.it: Razan Haddad! Non ti dimenticheremo mai!

translation.en: Bye!
[soldier] Hey, beautiful.
[soldier 2] What's up, ladies?
Come have a drink with us. Unless you don't like the look of me?
translation.it: Bevete con noi? Cos'è, non vi piace la mia faccia?

translation.en: Aren't we good enough for you?
[in English] I hate living in this neighborhood.
-[helicopter whirring] -[in Arabic] Where have you been?
Aren't you out a little late tonight?
[Yusra whispering] Sara, shush, be careful.
Give me the keys.
-You'll wake Baba and Mama. -[Sara] Shh.
[whispering] Lulu.
How are you, darling?
-Don't be frightened. -[distant bombing]
Good night, my love.
[mother] Do you have any idea what time it is?
translation.it: Hai idea di che ora è?

translation.en: Do you know what your dad would do if he knew?
translation.it: Sai cosa farebbe tuo padre se lo sapesse?

translation.en: [in English] Sorry.
[in Arabic] Did you hear about Razan Haddad?
I heard.
God bless her soul and give her mother strength.
translation.it: Che Allah benedica la sua anima e dia forza a sua madre.

translation.en: Yalla, darling. Time to sleep. You have training in the morning.
translation.it: Dai, mettiti a dormire. Domani hai l'allenamento presto.

translation.en: What was my time?
You're tired.
What was my time, Baba?
Coach. I'll see you at home.
translation.it: Chiamami coach. Ci vediamo a casa.

translation.en: [announcer] And it's Michael Phelps here in the 100m fly,
going for his seventh gold medal of these Games. Phelps in lane five.
translation.it: è nella corsia cinque, pronto a prendersi il settimo oro.

translation.en: [in Arabic] You see? It's all arm propulsion, not the kick.
translation.it: Vedi? La propulsione delle braccia è tutto.

translation.en: You know he went to Sydney when he was 15?
translation.it: Ha fatto le sue prime Olimpiadi a 15 anni.

translation.en: [announcer] But here comes Phelps!
[Yusra] The youngest American swimmer to compete at the Olympics.
translation.it: È stato il nuotatore americano più giovane alle Olimpiadi.

translation.en: [announcer] He gets it done! A new Olympic record.
translation.it: E ce l'ha fatta! Un nuovo record olimpico.

translation.en: You aren't a true athlete unless your dream is the Olympics.
translation.it: Non sei una vera atleta se non sogni di andare alle Olimpiadi.

translation.en: You're not going to represent us at the Nationals this time.
translation.it: Tu non parteciperai ai Nazionali quest'anno.

translation.en: Yusra and Arwa got better times than you.
translation.it: Yusra e Arwa hanno fatto tempi migliori dei tuoi.

translation.en: [announcer] Everything going perfectly for Michael Phelps here in Beijing.
translation.it: Le Olimpiadi di Pechino di Michael Phelps stanno andando a meraviglia.

translation.en: -[Sara in English] Hala left for Germany. -[Yusra] What?
translation.it: - Hala è ad Hannover, in Germania. - Che?

translation.en: -She went alone without her family. -Why didn't she tell us?
translation.it: - Ci è andata da sola. - Perché non ce l'ha detto?

translation.en: She's gonna apply for this family reunion thing.
When younger than 18, you have the right for your family to join you.
translation.it: Ne hai diritto, se hai meno di 18 anni.

translation.en: Can't believe she didn't tell us.
translation.it: Strano che non ce l'abbia detto.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -[in Arabic] You're disgusting.
[in English, laughing] I'm gonna post it!
No, actually, I don't wanna lose followers.
translation.it: No, non voglio perdere i miei follower.

translation.en: [in Arabic] IDs.
From Duma? What are you doing here?
translation.it: Lei è di Duma. Cosa ci fa qui?

translation.en: Why are you laughing?
Since when has laughing become illegal?
Give me your ID.
Please, she didn't mean disrespect.
Shut up, you.
[Sara] I'm not disrespecting.
Don't talk too much. Understand?
Raise your arms.
You'd do this to your sisters? You're not my sister.
translation.it: - Lo farebbe a sua sorella? - Non sei mia sorella.

translation.en: Is this your sister?
Stand up.
[soldier 2] Raise your arms.
Sniper!
[soldier 3] Eyes up!
Look up!
Go. There are people on the bus.
translation.it: Parti, ci sono persone sul bus.

translation.en: YOUR PLANES CAN'T BOMB OUR DREAMS
translation.it: I VOSTRI AEREI NON BOMBARDERANNO I NOSTRI SOGNI

translation.en: [father] How can I let my girls travel across Europe on their own?
translation.it: Non posso mandare le mie figlie in Europa da sole.

translation.en: What happened to the strong daughters you raised?
translation.it: Non eravamo più forti di mille maschi?

translation.en: You know Razan Haddad is my third friend to die this month?
translation.it: Razan Haddad è la terza mia amica che è morta questo mese.

translation.en: You know how many times we've come close to death?
translation.it: Sai quante volte abbiamo rischiato di morire?

translation.en: We need to get Yusra to Germany as soon as possible before she turns 18.
translation.it: Dobbiamo portare Yusra in Germania prima che compia 18 anni.

translation.en: [mother] The problem is it's so dangerous, my love.
I wish you could go on a plane.
Because European countries are just handing out visas to Syrians.
translation.it: Come no! Perché i paesi europei ce lo regalano il visto.

translation.en: Mama, it's very easy. We get to Germany and apply for family reunion,
translation.it: Andiamo in Germania e chiediamo il ricongiungimento. Facile.

translation.en: and you can all come on a plane. It's simple.
translation.it: E poi voi ci raggiungete in aereo.

translation.en: So I let you two risk your lives,
translation.it: E dovrei farvi attraversare le zone più pericolose d'Europa

translation.en: crawl through the most dangerous parts of Europe, to get us plane tickets?
translation.it: E dovrei farvi attraversare le zone più pericolose d'Europa per comprarci un volo?

translation.en: Everyone's doing it. Hala did it. She told me it's really easy…
translation.it: Lo fanno tutti. Lo ha fatto Hala e dice che è facile.

translation.en: [Yusra] My darling, come here.
-[father] It's out in the neighborhood. -[Shahed] I'm scared of the dark.
translation.it: - Non c'è luce in tutto il quartiere. - Ho paura del buio.

translation.en: Don't be scared, little one.
I hope the car battery will last.
translation.it: Spero che la batteria della macchina duri.

translation.en: [Yusra] Yalla, see? Now eat up.
I wish we could go back to Darayya.
translation.it: Vorrei tornare a vivere a Darayya.

translation.en: -Darayya is still too dangerous. -The whole of Syria is too dangerous.
translation.it: Darayya è troppo pericolosa. Tutta la Siria lo è.

translation.en: But you and your sister walking across Europe isn't dangerous at all?
translation.it: Invece non è pericoloso attraversare l'Europa a piedi?

translation.en: Yes, but once we arrive, we'll all be safe.
translation.it: Ma una volta arrivate, saremo al sicuro.

translation.en: That's if you arrive.
And if you arrive, what will you be?
translation.it: E se anche arrivaste, cosa diventereste?

translation.en: Refugees?
And you'll ruin your swimming careers.
[Sara] It's the best way.
[father] She always thinks she has the best way.
translation.it: Pensi sempre di avere ragione, tu.

translation.en: [angrily] You're not going.
That's the end of it.
If I was the one who was 17, you'd let me go on my own.
translation.it: Se fossi io quella che ha 17 anni, mi lasceresti andare.

translation.en: [in English] It's your precious Yusra you don't want to risk.
translation.it: Ma la tua preziosa Yusra non può rischiare.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Baba, about Sara…
Stop thinking about her.
Concentrate.
In the water, you're on your own. It's your fight.
translation.it: Nell'acqua sei da sola e combatti da sola.

translation.en: Your aim is to win. It's not about being nice.
translation.it: Il tuo obiettivo è uno solo: vincere.

translation.en: You have a goal, and you must reach it.
Focus on all the things you have control over.
translation.it: Concentrati su ciò su cui hai controllo.

translation.en: The start.
Streamline.
The kick off the wall. Your breathing.
[in English] Find your lane. Swim your race.
translation.it: Trova la tua corsia. Fai la tua gara.

translation.en: [announcer in English] Take your marks.
Yusra! Yusra!
Yusra! Yusra! Yusra! Yusra! Yusra!
Yusra! Yusra!
[Sara] Yusra!
[in Arabic] Two people died on the football field.
translation.it: Ci sono due morti sul campo di calcio.

translation.en: [Yusra] Baba.
Nizar is going to Germany.
[scoffs] Nizar?
He'll travel with me and Sara and protect us.
I wouldn't trust him to cross the road with you, let alone take you all the way to Germany.
translation.it: Non sa attraversare una strada, figurati portarvi in Germania.

translation.en: [mother] But, Ezzat, Nizar is their cousin.
-You know he would never leave them. -Whose side are you on?
translation.it: - Lui non le abbandonerebbe mai. - Da che parte stai?

translation.en: [mother] I'm not taking sides. This isn't about us. It's about the girls' lives.
translation.it: Sto dalla parte delle mie figlie. Voglio il loro bene.

translation.en: They don't have a future here anymore.
translation.it: Qui non hanno più un futuro.

translation.en: They're not going to summer camp. Aren't you a mother?
translation.it: Non stiamo parlando del campeggio estivo. Che madre sei?

translation.en: Baba, you see what's happening. The situation's gone from bad to worse.
translation.it: Baba, come vedi, la situazione va di male in peggio.

translation.en: How am I gonna make it to the Olympics if I can't swim?
translation.it: Non potrò andare alle Olimpiadi se non mi alleno.

translation.en: I promise, when I get to Europe, I'll keep training.
translation.it: Ti prometto che una volta in Europa, continuerò ad allenarmi.

translation.en: All the swimmers are leaving.
See? I want to go. I want to keep training.
I'll have to go with you. [Sara] And leave Mama and Shahed on their own?
translation.it: - Vengo con voi. - E lasci mamma e Shahed sole?

translation.en: What will become of me if something happens to her?
[Sara] Nothing will happen. Nizar and I will be with her.
translation.it: Non succederà niente. Ci saremo io e Nizar con lei.

translation.en: I promise.
[Yusra] Thank you, Baba.
[in English] Please, don't make me look like a liar.
translation.it: Non farmi fare la figura della bugiarda.

translation.en: [in Arabic] I'm not going with you.
[in English] OK? It's cold there, and I don't like the cold.
translation.it: Non vengo, ok? Fa freddo lì, e non mi piace il freddo.

translation.en: And I don't speak German. I speak English. Romy knows a sponsor in Canada.
translation.it: Non parlo il tedesco. Parlo inglese. Romy mi ha trovato uno sponsor in Canada.

translation.en: He's gonna help me with my papers, so I can go to Toronto.
translation.it: Mi aiuterà con i documenti per trasferirmi.

translation.en: -It never works, these things. -[scoffs]
translation.it: Queste cose non vanno mai bene.

translation.en: Canada is colder than Germany. So good luck!
translation.it: Il Canada è anche più freddo della Germania. Quindi, buona fortuna.

translation.en: [in English] Is she right?
[in Arabic] Dunno.
[in English] Canada is colder than Germany?
-Of course. -[Sara] Don't think Germany. Think Berlin.
translation.it: - Ma certo. - E andremo a Berlino, hai presente?

translation.en: DJ capital of the world, parties that go on all weekend.
translation.it: La mecca mondiale dei DJ. Feste tutti i fine settimana,

translation.en: Underground clubs.
Berghain.
-How do you know Berghain? -Of course I know.
translation.it: - Come sai del Berghain? - È famosissimo.

translation.en: DJ Niz needs European exposure.
More people will listen to your mixes.
translation.it: I tuoi mix faranno più ascolti.

translation.en: How can you let your two favorite cousins go to Europe without you?
translation.it: Vuoi lasciare che le tue cugine preferite vadano da sole?

translation.en: But you're not my favorite cousins. I have other cousins who are nice to me.
translation.it: Non siete le mie preferite. Ne ho altre due che mi sono affezionate.

translation.en: Fine. We will go without you.
[Ezzat in Arabic] You fly to Istanbul on a tourist visa.
translation.it: Volerete a Istanbul con un visto turistico.

translation.en: If anyone asks anything, you're tourists going to Turkey on holiday.
translation.it: Se vi fanno domande, state andando in vacanza in Turchia.

translation.en: Find a smuggler to take you over the Bulgarian border.
translation.it: Un trafficante vi porterà al confine bulgaro.

translation.en: This route is more expensive than the sea crossing, but much safer.
translation.it: Il tragitto via terra è più sicuro di quello via mare.

translation.en: -Ten thousand euros. Guard it. -How did you get it?
translation.it: - Diecimila euro. Tienili al sicuro. - Come li hai avuti?

translation.en: I borrowed it.
Isn't it too much, Baba? Keep some for yourselves.
translation.it: Non sono troppi, baba? Tienine un po' per voi.

translation.en: I'll try to get more in case you get stuck.
translation.it: Me ne farò prestare degli altri, se vi fermano.

translation.en: But if you do get stuck, you do the talking.
translation.it: Ma se dovessero fermarvi, parlerai tu.

translation.en: Of course. Don't worry, Uncle.
This is yours.
Tell people you swam for your country.
translation.it: Di' che nuotavi per la squadra siriana.

translation.en: That has to matter.
You too, Sara.
Can I borrow your Converse?
No, they are too big for you, and I'm taking them with me.
translation.it: Sono troppo grandi per i tuoi piedi. Le prendo io.

translation.en: Can I use your nail polish?
translation.it: E lo smalto per le unghie?

translation.en: No, you'll ruin it.
Can I come with you?
Who would take care of Lulu?
Look what I made you.
You made this?
[Shahed] It's to help you get to Germany.
translation.it: Per aiutarvi ad arrivare in Germania.

translation.en: Oh, my love.
I'm going to take it with me.
Let's put Lulu in her cage before she poops on your bed.
translation.it: Mettiamo Lulu in gabbia o farà la cacca sul tuo letto.

translation.en: -[Shahed] Come help us. -What are you doing?
[Yusra] Lulu's flying!
[mother] When you were born,
I decided to give you the things I didn't have.
translation.it: ho voluto darvi le cose che io non ho avuto.

translation.en: Freedom to choose whatever you want in life.
translation.it: Come la libertà di fare quello che volete nella vita.

translation.en: When I closed my eyes and imagined your futures…
translation.it: Immaginavo il vostro futuro a occhi chiusi.

translation.en: [Ezzat] Here he comes.
[mother] …I didn't picture you in a wedding dress like the other mothers.
translation.it: Non volevo che il vostro destino fosse solo il matrimonio.

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
[Ezzat] What happened to you?
I forgot my passport. Habibi…
All I hoped was for you to graduate from the best universities…
translation.it: Volevo che frequentaste le migliori università.

translation.en: Don't worry. They are like my sisters. I'll guard them with my life.
translation.it: Tranquillo, per me loro sono come sorelle. Le difenderò con la vita.

translation.en: Come here.
[mother] Having wonderful careers and living the best life,
translation.it: Volevo una carriera per voi, il meglio.

translation.en: that was everything I wished for.
And we'll have all these things, Mama.
translation.it: Le avremo tutte queste cose, mama.

translation.en: [mother] Hopefully.
Oh, my love.
-I'll keep her safe. Don't worry. -[mother] Keep yourself safe too.
translation.it: - Ci penserò io a lei, tranquilla. - Pensa anche a te.

translation.en: As soon as you arrive, call us, OK?
[Ezzat] Do you know that I love you?
translation.it: Lo sai che ti voglio bene?

translation.en: I know. [Ezzat] Do you really know?
Don't go. Please don't go.
translation.it: Non andate. Perché ve ne andate?

translation.en: We'll meet in Germany soon.
I swear. Really soon.
-[agent] Passports. Where are you going? -[Nizar] Istanbul.
-[security in English] Laptop, telephone… -[mother in Arabic] Have a safe journey.
[security in English] Laptop, telephone, computer.
[in Arabic] May God protect you.
[announcement in English] Passengers landing on flight number 221 to Istanbul via Beirut,
translation.it: I passeggeri del volo 221 per Istanbul con scalo a Beirut

translation.en: make your way to the gate now.
translation.it: sono pregati di recarsi alla porta di imbarco.

translation.en: [steward in Arabic] Welcome aboard this flight to Istanbul.
translation.it: Benvenuti a bordo di questo volo per Istanbul.

translation.en: We would like to remind you that life jackets are the property of the airline.
translation.it: I giubbotti di salvataggio sono di proprietà della compagnia aerea.

translation.en: Any attempt to take them will be considered an act of theft, and you will be prosecuted.
translation.it: L'appropriazione sarà considerata furto e perseguita penalmente.

translation.en: [in English] And the airline would like to remind you
translation.it: La compagnia aerea vi ricorda anche

translation.en: that you're a bunch of homeless refugees now.
translation.it: che ora siete un mucchio di profughi sfollati.

translation.en: We're not refugees.
We have a home.
[Nizar in English] We want one room.
Oh, OK.
So this is how it's gonna be.
Yes. Yusra and me in the beds, you on the floor next to the door
translation.it: Sì, io e Yusra nei letti e tu per terra, vicino alla porta

translation.en: so you can protect us like you're meant to.
translation.it: a fare il tuo dovere: proteggerci.

translation.en: Get used to it.
[Nizar] Amazing.
I saw on Facebook that there's a square all the Syrians go to. We should go there.
translation.it: Su Facebook ho visto che i siriani si ritrovano in una piazza.

translation.en: You think you're gonna handle all the arrangements?
translation.it: Pensi di prenderle tu le decisioni?

translation.en: This is what you agreed with Baba.
translation.it: O è quello che avete deciso tu e baba?

translation.en: -[clicks tongue] Exactly. -Yeah, whatever.
-[Yusra] You are keeping it there? -Yeah, where no one looks.
translation.it: Li tieni lì? Non ci guarda nessuno.

translation.en: -Not what I heard! -What did you hear?
translation.it: - Io so che qualcuno ci guarda. - Che ne sai?

translation.en: -[Yusra] Yalla! -[Nizar] Yeah?
[Yusra in Arabic] Don't hurt my sister.
translation.it: Non fare male a mia sorella.

translation.en: [in English] That's my bed!
-[in Arabic] No, my bed. -I'm gonna pass out here.
-[Nizar in English] It's my bed! -[all laughing]
[Nizar in Arabic] Enough. What?
[in English] The floor it is.
I love you guys.
[in Arabic] We're looking for a smuggler.
Do you know someone reliable?
[in English] We have to cross that bridge.
I think we walked that way.
Turkey has more than two million Syrians, and he can't find any of them.
translation.it: In Turchia vivono due milioni di siriani e lui non riesce a trovarne uno.

translation.en: [in Arabic] We're still on the European side. Yeah, so where do we go?
translation.it: - Siamo ancora sul lato europeo. - Dove si va, quindi?

translation.en: We've taken the wrong bridge.
[in English] Change of plan. No more following Nizar. Following them.
translation.it: Cambiamo tattica. Seguiamo loro, non Nizar.

translation.en: -What? -From now on, we share leadership. Yalla.

translation.en: Yeah, but how long until we know whether it's been successful or no?
translation.it: E quando saprò se la richiesta di asilo è stata accettata?

translation.en: We have a lot of people to process. It's currently taking a year or two.
translation.it: Abbiamo tantissime richieste. Ci vogliono uno o due anni.

translation.en: Yeah, but we need to apply also for the family reunion.
translation.it: Sì, ma vogliamo anche richiedere il ricongiungimento.

translation.en: My sister Yusra is still 17.
Yeah.
Your sister will be 18 in March.
translation.it: Tua sorella compirà 18 anni a marzo.

translation.en: That's not enough time.
We require a minimum of six months for family reunion.
translation.it: Il ricongiungimento familiare richiede un minimo di sei mesi.

translation.en: Yeah, but my younger sister and my parents are still in Damascus.
translation.it: Ma mia sorella e i miei genitori sono ancora a Damasco.

translation.en: It's very dangerous. They have to come here.
translation.it: È pericoloso laggiù. Devono venire qui.

translation.en: Syria's being bombed.
I'm sorry.
Please.
There's nothing I can do.
[Sara] Yusra.
[Sara] Yusra, please.
It's a processing thing.
So, they have to come the same way we did?
translation.it: Quindi per venire dovranno fare come noi?

translation.en: We should never have left.
I lost vital training. My swimming is shit.
translation.it: Non ho potuto allenarmi e ora nuoto di merda.

translation.en: That's all you care about? Swimming?
translation.it: Ma solo del nuoto ti frega?

translation.en: [in Arabic] Think you're being selfish?
Selfish? I'm selfish? Mama, Baba, and Shahed are in my heart.
translation.it: Egoista, io? Penso sempre a mama, baba e a Shahed.

translation.en: I keep thinking about them. But you don't, you just carry on.
translation.it: Io penso a loro. Sei tu quella che va avanti come un treno.

translation.en: You're reckless. They're in danger now because of you.
translation.it: Sei un'irresponsabile. Loro sono in pericolo per colpa tua.

translation.en: -You can talk. -What?
At least I have a goal.
What are you doing here?
You try to be cool and waste your time partying.
translation.it: Fai la figa e vai alle feste.

translation.en: I don't know you anymore.
You're not swimming. You're not doing anything.
translation.it: Non stai nuotando. Non fai niente.

translation.en: You're never going to achieve anything.
[Sven in English] Right, OK.
You missed the second turn. Your frequency was too slow in the last 25 meters. What's wrong?
translation.it: Hai sbagliato la seconda virata e rallentato nei 25 metri. Che hai?

translation.en: Nothing.
-Sure? -Yes.
OK. I wanted to tell you later,
but I have something that will make you smile.
translation.it: ma devo dirti qualcosa che ti farà sorridere.

translation.en: What?
I heard the International Olympic Committee
gave a press conference, and they were announcing help for refugee athletes.
translation.it: ha annunciato che aiuterà gli atleti rifugiati.

translation.en: They're forming a refugee team for Rio.
translation.it: Costituiranno una squadra di rifugiati per Rio.

translation.en: I sent them your times and told them about your swim across the sea,
translation.it: Ho mandato i tuoi tempi, ho raccontato della traversata in mare

translation.en: and, hey, if we work hard and your times improve,
translation.it: e se lavoriamo duro e miglioriamo i tuoi tempi,

translation.en: you can get onto the team.
What?
If you had the chance, would you want to compete
translation.it: Se potessi scegliere, preferiresti gareggiare perché sei bravo

translation.en: because you were good enough or because people felt sorry for you?
translation.it: Se potessi scegliere, preferiresti gareggiare perché sei bravo o perché provano pena per te?

translation.en: I want to go to the Olympics more than anything.
translation.it: Voglio andare alle Olimpiadi più di ogni altra cosa.

translation.en: But when I go, I will be there swimming for my country.
translation.it: Ma quando ci andrò, nuoterò per il mio Paese.

translation.en: [Yusra] I'm sorry.
About what I said last night.
translation.it: Per quello che ho detto ieri sera.

translation.en: You meant it.
Not in the way I said it.
You're so soft on the outside. So hard underneath.
translation.it: Sembri così innocua e dolce, ma sei di roccia dentro.

translation.en: But I kind of admire this about you.
translation.it: Ma ammiro questo lato di te.

translation.en: I'm so happy you're swimming.
Sven called, by the way.
About the refugee team.
You should do it.
This was everything you ever wanted.
translation.it: È quello che hai sempre voluto.

translation.en: Not in the way I want it.
translation.it: Ma non è come lo volevo.

translation.en: Yeah, but nothing has been the way we wanted it.
translation.it: Sì, ma niente è andato come volevamo.

translation.en: Why would this be any different?
I want to swim for Syria.
That's what Baba wanted.
Baba ever tell you why he stopped swimming for Syria?
translation.it: Baba ti ha mai detto perché ha smesso?

translation.en: Military service.
He was actually very good.
At the beginning, I thought it was an excuse, but it wasn't.
translation.it: All'inizio pensavo fosse una scusa, ma non lo era.

translation.en: And he had to lose two years of training just to carry a gun.
translation.it: E ha perso due anni di allenamenti per tenere in mano un fucile.

translation.en: Life is not fair.
I'm Sara Mardini.
I have no country anymore.
This might be the only opportunity of your life.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere l'unica occasione della tua vita.

translation.en: Look at me.
Don't be stupid. Take it.
Oh, I was looking for you.
I wanted to go to the Olympics for Team Syria,
but if I can't, I'd like to swim for Team Sven.
translation.it: ma se non posso, gareggerò per il tuo team.

translation.en: If you still want me to,
even though I'm stupid, and I don't deserve it.
translation.it: anche se sono stupida e non lo merito.

translation.en: For 2020, we will train for Syria, but for 2016, I'm Team Refugee.
translation.it: Per il 2020, mi allenerò per la Siria. Ma nel 2016, gareggerò nella squadra dei rifugiati.

translation.en: We have a lot of work to do.
Ready?
[Ezzat in Arabic] Tell me about your training.
[Yusra] Of course, Baba.
[Ezzat] I want you to describe every detail.
The feeling underwater.
Every stroke, every move you make.
translation.it: Ogni bracciata che fai, ogni movimento.

translation.en: [in English] I want to know what this German has done.
translation.it: Voglio sapere come se la cava il tedesco.

translation.en: That was kind of "flop-flop." No, you have to…
The head is too high. Focus on the elbow.
translation.it: La testa è troppo alta. Concentrati sul gomito.

translation.en: OK?
What was my time?
What was my time?
-We're going to Rio. -No.
-We're going to Rio. -We're going to Rio?
translation.it: - Andiamo a Rio. - Andiamo a Rio?

translation.en: We're going to Rio!
-Hey! We are going to Rio! -[Yusra screams]
But I can't stop thinking about them.
translation.it: Non riesco a non pensare a loro.

translation.en: I saw on Facebook that 100,000 people
translation.it: Su Facebook si dice che 100.000 persone

translation.en: had to cross the sea to Greece in the last two months.
translation.it: hanno attraversato il mare fino alla Grecia.

translation.en: You know, what we've been through isn't special.
translation.it: Non abbiamo fatto niente di speciale.

translation.en: Well…
What I saw on Facebook was this place in Sonnenallee
translation.it: Invece io ho letto che c'è un posto a Sonnenallee

translation.en: run by this guy from Damascus.
translation.it: gestito da un tizio di Damasco.

translation.en: He makes the same whipped ice cream that he made back there.
translation.it: Che fa la ricetta originale del dolce di latte con gelato.

translation.en: We should try it.
[mother in Arabic] An Olympian, my own daughter.
An Olympian, I don't believe it.
All that time at the poolside wasn't for nothing.
It's good. It's as it should be.
And Sara? You didn't have the times?
translation.it: Sara? Tu non ce l'hai fatta?

translation.en: Even for this refugee team?
No, Baba. I didn't.
"Refugee team"? You say it like it doesn't count.
translation.it: "Con i rifugiati." Lo dici come se non contasse niente.

translation.en: Nice tracksuit.
-[Yusra] What have you done? -It's good at the back?
translation.it: Che hai fatto? Mi sta bene dietro?

translation.en: [Yusra] It's beautiful.
[Sara] I always wanted it short.
I wanna tell you something.
I've decided…
I'm going back to Lesbos.
[in Arabic] What?
[in English] I found this organization, and I've been emailing them,
and they help everyone who's crossing.
translation.it: che aiuta i profughi ad attraversare.

translation.en: -I want to be part of this. -No, Sara, please.
translation.it: Voglio aiutarli. No, Sara, ti prego.

translation.en: We need to move on, go forward.
-What are you doing? -I need to be there. To help everyone.
translation.it: Perché lo fai? Voglio aiutare quelle persone.

translation.en: Give them water, shoes, everything we didn't have.
translation.it: Distribuire acqua, scarpe, quello che non hanno dato a noi.

translation.en: You know, Mama, Shahed, Baba will come the same way, maybe.
translation.it: Anche mama, Shahed e baba arriveranno così.

translation.en: So you won't come with me to Rio?
Look, you were right. I've never done anything with my life.
translation.it: Avevi ragione, non ho mai combinato niente nella vita.

translation.en: This is the first time I feel this.
translation.it: È la prima volta che voglio fare qualcosa.

translation.en: Look, you can move on.
You can become an Olympian.
I can't.
This is the right thing for me.
translation.it: È la cosa giusta per me.

translation.en: [Nizar] What's this?
[Yusra] I was going to wait for your birthday.
Happy early birthday! [chuckles]
You remembered my birthday?
You're not allowed to give up.
-Thank you. -No, thank you.
Maybe you are my favorite cousin.
translation.it: Forse sei tu la mia cugina preferita.

translation.en: I don't believe you. You said this to Sara last week, so…
translation.it: Non ti credo. L'hai detto anche a Sara.

translation.en: I think I'll get going. I'll leave you prepare your stuff.
translation.it: Ora credo che me ne andrò. Così prepari i bagagli.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Uh… You've made us walk taller.
Don't worry about winning.
I am so proud of you.
Peace.
[in English] Bye.
[woman on PA] Next stop, the Olympic Village.
[man in English] Welcome to Rio de Janeiro.
11,238 athletes from 207 nations
gathering to take part in the Games of the 31st Olympiad,
translation.it: convergono qui per prendere parte ai 31esimi Giochi olimpici,

translation.en: the greatest sporting spectacle in the world.
translation.it: il più grande spettacolo sportivo del mondo.

translation.en: [Yusra] Thank you.
-What's that? -I don't know!
[man] But one new team has been generating a special buzz.
translation.it: Ma c'è una nuova squadra a infervorare gli animi.

translation.en: The Refugee Olympic Team.
-So, Yusra, welcome to Rio. -Thank you.
-Oh my God, that's David Rudisha. -Who?
Don't you know anybody?
I've been swimming since I was a kid.
[man on PA] Welcome to the world-famous Maracanã Stadium
translation.it: YUSRA MARDINI È STATA QUI Benvenuti al famosissimo Stadio Maracanã

translation.en: in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, for the opening ceremony.
translation.it: di Rio de Janeiro, dove si terrà la cerimonia di apertura dei giochi.

translation.en: [woman on PA] They have traveled from all corners of the earth
translation.it: Arrivano da ogni angolo della Terra

translation.en: and have spent a lifetime training for this moment.
translation.it: e si allenano da una vita per prepararsi per questo evento.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the great moment has arrived.
translation.it: Signore e signori, è arrivato il grande momento.

translation.en: [announcer] We welcome the Refugee Olympic Team.
translation.it: Diamo il benvenuto alla squadra dei Rifugiati.

translation.en: [man on PA] A journey that has taken the flame all the way from Greece to Rio.
translation.it: Un viaggio che ha portato la fiamma olimpica dalla Grecia a Rio.

translation.en: [all chanting] Refugees!
[screams] Sara!
I want to know, for everyone out there, what's been your main motivation…
translation.it: A nome di tutti, vorrei chiederti cosa ti ha spinto ad arrivare fin qui.

translation.en: [girl 1] That's the Syrian girl that's racing today.
translation.it: È la ragazza siriana che gareggia oggi.

translation.en: [girl 2] I mean, I'm all for charity, but…
translation.it: Cioè, sono a favore della beneficenza, ma...

translation.en: [girl 1] Exactly. The rest of us had to work to be here.
translation.it: Esatto. Noi le Olimpiadi ce le siamo guadagnate.

translation.en: [Yusra on TV] Yeah, it's such an honor to be part of it.
translation.it: È un grande onore essere qui.

translation.en: It's a chance to be a voice and to give hope.
translation.it: È un'occasione di visibilità, un'occasione per infondere speranza.

translation.en: Hi. [Sara] So, aren't you about to swim your race?
translation.it: - Ciao. - Allora, stai per fare la tua gara?

translation.en: -Yes. -What are you doing sitting on your ass?
translation.it: - Sì. - E perché te ne stai lì seduta?

translation.en: How do you--
[Yusra screeches] I can't believe you're here!
This is crazy!
Sister.
How did you get here?
I contacted the sponsor of the refugee team,
translation.it: Ho contattato lo sponsor del team Rifugiati.

translation.en: and I told them that I was the sister of the world-famous Yusra Mardini.
translation.it: Ho detto che sono la sorella della famosissima Yusra Mardini.

translation.en: -And I even flew business class. -What?!
translation.it: - E mi hanno messo in Business class. - Che?

translation.en: -We were in economy. -I don't fly economy, habibi.
translation.it: - E noi in Economy! - Io in Economy, habibi?

translation.en: -And what about Lesbos? -I'm gonna go straight after.
translation.it: - E a Lesbo ci vai ancora? - Ci andrò direttamente da qui.

translation.en: I wanna show you something.
[in Arabic] Good luck, my love. I'm not worried because you're lucky.
translation.it: In bocca al lupo. Non sono preoccupata perché sei fortunata.

translation.en: Luck has nothing to do with it. Remember everything I've taught you.
translation.it: La fortuna non c'entra niente. Ricorda solo i miei insegnamenti.

translation.en: I hope you win.
[in English] Good luck, Yusra. We love you. We miss you.
translation.it: In bocca al lupo, Yusra. Ti vogliamo bene e ci manchi.

translation.en: So grown-up!
[Shada] Good luck.
[Sara] Actually, I didn't really wanna show you this one.
[Yusra] Why? Is she back in Eritrea?
translation.it: Perché? È dovuta tornare in Eritrea?

translation.en: Is she safe?
I heard other swimmers talking.
translation.it: Ho sentito cosa dicono le altre nuotatrici.

translation.en: They said I shouldn't be here.
translation.it: Dicono che non dovrei essere qui.

translation.en: They said I don't deserve it.
Well, they're right. You shouldn't.
translation.it: Hanno ragione. Non dovresti essere qui.

translation.en: You should be at the bottom of the Greek sea.
translation.it: Dovresti essere sul fondo del mare greco.

translation.en: Or sleeping on the roadside of Hungaria.
translation.it: O dormire sul ciglio della strada, in Ungheria.

translation.en: Or you should be dead in a hole in Dariyya.
translation.it: O essere morta e gettata in una fossa a Darayya.

translation.en: I just wanna be a swimmer.
You know Olympians are people who are supposed to do amazing things.
translation.it: Gli atleti olimpici sono persone incredibili.

translation.en: Don't do that.
Remember what Baba used to say?
"Find your lane. Swim your race."
translation.it: "Trova la tua corsia. Fai la tua gara."

translation.en: It's all bullshit.
[man on PA] Please welcome the athletes in heat one of the women's 100m butterfly.
translation.it: Diamo il benvenuto alle atlete della batteria uno nei 100 metri farfalla.

translation.en: [Sara] You should swim for all of us.
[Sara] You should swim for Baba
because he didn't.
Swim for me
because I couldn't.
Swim for Sven because he couldn't.
translation.it: Nuota per Sven. Neanche lui ci è riuscito.

translation.en: Swim for Shada.
Swim for Razan Haddad.
[man on PA] Swimming for Qatar in lane two, Nada Arakji.
translation.it: Nuota per il Qatar, nella corsia due, Nadia Arakji.

translation.en: And for everyone who died trying to find a new life.
translation.it: E per quanti sono morti nel tentativo di rifarsi una vita.

translation.en: Swim for them.
[man on PA] Swimming in lane three for Rwanda, Johanna Umurungi.
translation.it: Nuota nella corsia tre per il Ruanda, Johanna Umurungi.

translation.en: You're so much more than an Olympian.
translation.it: Sei molto più di un'atleta olimpica.

translation.en: [man on PA] Swimming in lane four for the Refugee Olympic Team,
translation.it: E nella corsia quattro, per la Squadra olimpica dei Rifugiati,

translation.en: Yusra Mardini.
[announcer] Take your marks.
-Yusra, go! -Faster!
Yeah!
-[sobbing] -Yusra!
Yeah! Yeah! [laughing]
-Are you racing me? -Are we racing?
translation.it: - Mi stai sfidando? - È una gara?

translation.en: Sara, please, I'm tired.
-No one's forcing you to race. -I hate you.
translation.it: - Nessuno ti costringe a correre. - Ti odio.

translation.en: You love me!
Kiss my Olympic ass. I'm gonna kick your Olympic ass!
translation.it: - Bacia il mio culo olimpico! - Gli faccio il culo al tuo culo olimpico!

translation.en: [laughing] No! No!
